text: nam'mute drstantannalute nere vakrata kanikkunnavararea avar nam'mute drstiyil ninn marannu peakukayilla; tircca. appeal narakattileriyappetunnavananea uttaman atalla uyirttelunnelpinre nalil nirbhayanayitt varunnavanea? ninnal uddesiccat ninnal ceytukealluka. tirccayayum avan ninnal pravarttikkunnat kantariyunnavanakunnu
